data.title: Monroe Intelligent Suspensions
data.text:
Over the years, our partnership with McLaren Automotive has been a source of immense pride and innovation. As a provider to one of the world’s most prestigious ultra-luxury and performance In collaboration with McLaren, we aim to highlight the advanced technology and exceptional engineering that Monroe Ride Solutions brings to the table. Our partnership with […]

This weekend, the Pikes Peak International Hill Climb witnessed a thrilling performance from Gardner Nichols, who returned with a second-generation Rivian R1T Quad. Nichols, supported by thousands of enthusiastic spectators and fans, was determined to break his own record of 11:23.983. Gardner was ready to conquer the mountain. The second-generation Rivian R1T Quad, weighing 6,555 […]

Driver Gardner Nichols Leveraged Leading-Edge Suspension Technology To Set Record for Production Electric Trucks in 2024 Northville, Michigan, June 21, 2024 – Rivian engineer Gardner Nichols’ first encounter with the famed Pikes Peak International Hill Climb (PPIHC), in 2023, resulted in a new elapsed-time record (11:23.983) for production electric pickup trucks. Nichols and his Monroe Intelligent […]

Highly tunable Monroe® Ride Refine™ Advanced HRS system enhances peak load management, minimizes noise, furthers chassis light weighting strategies. All-hydraulic system now available in Monroe® OE Solutions double-tube dampers for BEVs, other comparatively heavy passenger vehicles Northville, Illinois, June 17, 2024 – Tenneco, one of the world’s leading providers of passive and electronic dampers for […]

Opened in June 1964, plant helped fuel the iconic Monroe brand, of suspension technology for global OEMs Sint-Truiden, Belgium, May 6, 2024 – Tenneco, one of the world’s premier suppliers of systems and components for the automotive, commercial truck and other mobility categories, is finalizing plans to celebrate the 60th anniversary of its landmark Monroe Ride Solutions […]
